Jei turite klausimų, susisiekite su mumis [${support}].

What is Wire?
Wire is the most secure collaboration platform. Work with your team and external
partners wherever you are through messages, video conferencing and file sharing
– always secured with end-to-end-encryption. Learn more [https://wire.com/].
